title: The antibacterial activity of the copper for Staphylococcus aureus 124 and Pseudomonas aeruginosa 18 depends on its state: metalized, chelated and ionic
content:
Publication date: 30 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): A.I. Bozhkov, V.V. Bobkov, T.P. Osolodchenko, O.I. Yurchenko, V.Y. Ganin, E.G. Ivanov, Y.D. Batuieva, V.V. Minukhin, A.V. Goltvyanskiy, V.A. Kozheshkurt, S.V. Ponomarenko
